synopsis.text: University student Ryosuke Oshiro presents a poignant tale of a middle school boy navigating the complexities of adolescence in "Graduate Work 2014" from Tokyo University of the Arts. The boy, an aspiring artist, finds solace in capturing moments through photography and translating them into drawings. However, his world is turned upside down when he stumbles upon his crush with another boy during his daily commute. As he grapples with the blurred lines between his idealized version of love and the harsh realities of growing up, the boy's journey unfolds in a delicate dance of emotions, inviting viewers to explore the intricacies of young love and the ever-changing landscape of the human heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
